content.query:
--Copies data from the CSV file into the data staging table within the Spotify Data Warehouse
COPY INTO staging.playlist
(songId 1, added_at 2, playlist 3, trackName 4, artist 5, artist_genre 6, albumName 7, popularity 8)
FROM 'https://dataengineerproject.dfs.core.windows.net/dataengineerproject/spotify_datafiles/tracks3.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2 -- skip header row
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://dataengineerproject.dfs.core.windows.net/dataengineerproject/'
)
--END
GO
